column4: What does a dist-upgrade do that just upgrading packages doesn't?
I got a prompt to do a dist-upgrade today in Feisty beta.
no, ubuntu uses ubuntu-desktop metapackage for that
[WaZ] , ok, so what does upgrading do?
i think dist-upgrade also upgrades system files
[WaZ] , is that for modifying things that aren't in the metapackage?
not sure tho, i guess if dist-upgrade: reboot needed
well if dist-upgrade: reboot possibly needed
makes sense for servers at least, to make the difference
I think WOW works in wine
